lines: Greetings, friend. Has our array of beautifully decorated eggs caught your eye? It isn't the work of highly trained dodos, but of we Dreamers: all part and parcel of the Hatching–tide festivities.

If you would like to play your own part in the festival, simply disguise yourself as a spriggan and head out hunting! The skies of Eorzea are heavy with enormous eggs, with rich rewards for whosoever should crack their stony shells.
Greetings, my friend! Have you a gift for me, or is it only fortune that you are the bearer of now? Ah, but forgive my jest─it seems I'm still in the party spirit!

Seriously, though─it was not only fortune you brought, but a beaming smile to the face of my good friend Jihli. For that I am eternally thankful. May the Archons of yore bless you and keep you, Forename!
